meta.title: Agio | Local-first second brain for notes
meta.description: Agio is a local-first second brain. Capture from anywhere. AI adds titles, links people and projects, and suggests tags. Search by meaning, not just keywords. Built for founders and knowledge workers.

hero.body: For founders and knowledge workers who capture a lot and drop note systems when upkeep piles up. Agio keeps notes organized: clear titles, linked people and projects, and search by meaning. No tagging yourself.
hero.subtext: Local-first by design. Join the waitlist for launch access.

features.headline: Capture once.
features.body: Most note apps get abandoned when upkeep starts. Agio turns messy notes into a clean, searchable base. It generates titles, links people and projects, and suggests tags so you never spend time cleaning up.

intelligent.title: Zero-maintenance notes
intelligent.description: Write naturally. Agio formats your note, generates a clear title, and extracts tags automatically. You stop spending time cleaning up.

discovery.title: Find anything, fast
discovery.description: Search by meaning, not just keywords. Resurface decisions, ideas, and next steps across projects when you need them.

crafted.title: Local-first, built for focus
crafted.description: Your knowledge stays on your device by default. Fast, private, and always available. Links and video capture via extension coming.

pillars.title: Capture
pillars.description: Voice, notes, screenshots, email, and imports. One place for what you save.

pillars.title: Organize
pillars.description: AI generates titles and links people, projects, and topics. Tags appear without you tagging.

pillars.title: Find
pillars.description: Semantic search over your memories. Get the right context when you need it.

vision.label: Vision
vision.headline: A second brain you'll still use in six months.
vision.body: Agio removes the maintenance tax that kills most PKM systems. Capture quickly, stay organized automatically, and keep your knowledge useful over time.
trustPoints: Local-first and private. Your data stays on your device.
No manual taxonomy. Agio suggests titles, entities, and tags.
Works over time. No constant tending to stay useful.

footer.body: Join founders and knowledge workers who want AI organization without the maintenance overhead.
footer.disclaimer: No spam. Just launch access and product updates.
